body.name: ZWYING Laptop 【Win 11/MS Office 2019】 7.0-inch Touchscreen Ultra Light Mini Laptop,All Metal Texture,High-Speed Celeron J4105 CPU,12G RAM/512GB SSD High-Performance Gaming Computer(512GB SSD)
deliveryMessages: This item cannot be shipped to your selected delivery location. Please choose a different delivery location.
features: 💻【𝐄𝐚𝐬𝐲 𝐭𝐨 𝐂𝐚𝐫𝐫𝐲 & 𝐒𝐩𝐚𝐜𝐞 𝐒𝐚𝐯𝐢𝐧𝐠】7.0-inch Mini Notebook, weighing only 0.65kg, this small and mini design is very space-saving, with a small size that doesn't take up a lot of space on the desktop. This makes it very easy to carry and hold, such as coffee shops and airplane seats. They are often lighter than traditional laptops, making them suitable for use on the go, while traveling, or in situations where you need to move around a lot. It's a must-have for business people working on the go and easy to carry!

📫【𝐏𝐨𝐰𝐞𝐫𝐟𝐮𝐥 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐞𝐟𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐂𝐏𝐔】The laptop comes with 12GB of RAM and a large 512GB SSD, providing plenty of memory and storage space for storing your documents, music, pictures and videos. Equipped with high-speed and silent CPU Celeron J4105 processor. With a standard frequency of 1.5GH and a maximum frequency of up to 2.0GHz, it runs very clearly and smoothly and can effectively handle multiple programs and tasks simultaneously without even lagging, thus improving performance and efficiency.

🔋【𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐯𝐞𝐧𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐌𝐮𝐥𝐭𝐢-𝐔𝐬𝐞】Multiple connection ports are designed to enable customers to easily connect external devices. It can be connected to various media via built-in WIFI, built-in Bluetooth, USB3.0*2, mini HDMI, headphone and microphone ports, and SD card port! It also allows many different types of external devices to be accessed at the same time, which makes the computer more expandable and adaptable, easy to operate and meet different tasks and needs.

💌【𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐯𝐞𝐧𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐒𝐨𝐟𝐭𝐰𝐚𝐫𝐞】The fastest Windows 11 Pro 64 bit in history! MS Office 2019 (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, etc.), Chrome, Security pre installed, use now, no need to purchase other software! Our laptop comes with a one-year quality guarantee. During the warranty period, if there are quality issues with the computer within the warranty scope, you can contact us through customer support and email, and you can easily obtain technical support and repair services.

🚀【𝐀𝐥𝐥 𝐦𝐞𝐭𝐚𝐥 𝐦𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐚𝐥/𝐭𝐨𝐮𝐜𝐡 𝐬𝐜𝐫𝐞𝐞𝐧】The sturdy and durable laptop is made of metal material, which is resistant to deformation, scratches, and easy to clean without stains. Fashionable appearance design, CNC precision machining technology, and support for manual writing with the original pen, bringing you the latest upgrade of the notebook in 2022! The functions of the touch screen can be operated directly on the screen with fingers or a stylus, without the need for a mouse and keyboard.

Used in a variety of scenarios Take it to anywhere as you want

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mini laptop
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I love this little PC. It is great for on the go. For me I have it for little bit of programing and to do some home work in between classes. Carrying around this Alienware I have is just becoming to much all the time. It weights about 6-7lbs. Let me also start with the specs that it claims to have, are not updated. I got the 512 version was supposed to come with 8gb Ram and for the CPU was supposed to be J4105. This one came with 512, 12gb Ram, and for CPU J4125, it has the Intel UHD600 GPU. Which makes it a little faster then the previous the J4125 speed is 2.0-2.7ghz. the J4105 is 1.5-2.4ghz. Also the back side of the monitor is magnetic guess to hold things out of the way. Not sure why it is there, I do see how it can come in handy. I have a few photos of that I put in to show.I have played some games it. The video is Fallout New Vegas. It was left at the auto select graphics at medium. I haven't messed with the graphics much on here yet. It runs good and doesn't lag. I have ran Valhiem as well. Had to put everything on low, and it ran fine. It is fun little thing easy to close the top and go. I have a little messenger bag it fits fine with my raspberry pi, and flipper zero. It also came with a wireless Bluetooth mouse which was nice to have. Even playing fallout or doing work on it for a few hours it doesn't get all that hot. My Alienware will bake your legs. The battery life is decent for it's size. I can get 2-4 hours depending what I am doing. It does have Windows 11 PRO Active fully installed, also it has MICROSOFT Office full version installed. Some reason has MineCraft education edition it runs fine too. It is a nice laptop I do not have any complaints really a backlit keyboard would be nice, guess can't always get what you want. You can not go wrong with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic features in a quality machine; great customer service to back it up
reviews.reviewText: We've been looking for a portable laptop to bring with us to a cafe or while traveling, and the specs on this little machine ticked off a lot of boxes: 1) well performing 4105 Celeron chip; 2) sufficient RAM (12g vs the typical 6g or 8g on lesser mini laptops); 3) good storage (256g should be sufficient for most and was the model we got); 4) good connectivity (two USB 3.0, mini-HDMI, TF card slot); and 5) good battery life. This was perfect for our needs and came in a very light, responsive package. Most important for us was to have Windows 11 loaded and legitimate, and super convenient to also have Microsoft Office pre-installed so we didn't have to pay more for that productivity suite later on.This little thing was wonderful, and we only have two suggestions for future improvements: a) the mouse buttons were a bit too close to the space bar and frequently were mis-hit while typing leading to some deletions or unintended text; and b) perhaps switch out one of the USB 3.0's for a USB type C port, which is more common these days. Bonus points to make it chargeable via that port to standardize the charging block. For (a), the seller helpfully includes a wireless mouse so you no longer have to use the keyboard mouse. What a great bonus!We had a problem with the mouse on the keyboard, and contacted the seller. They were responsive and responded within a day to try to trouble shoot and solve the problem. Be reassured that if you purchase this unit via Amazon Prime you will have customer support to work through issues and come up with a solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Purchase Despite the Need for Software Workarounds
reviews.reviewText: A surprisingly well-built computer sold by a responsive seller. Other reviewers have examined its hardware—touchscreen, 12GB RAM, ssd sizes—so my notes are more specific to the software side.My device arrived with a genuine copy of Windows 11 Pro, but already set up as Administrator with Office 2019 installed. Concerned, I reinstalled Windows via USB Creation Disk, but there are no machine-specific drivers available for download. So before a reinstall, you must back up the existing drivers through an elevated cmd command such as: dism /online /export-driver /destination:"full path of folder on a usb/sd"When you search the web, you can find other ways to save your original drivers, but do NOT reinstall Windows without first putting them on an external drive. After the reinstall, direct missing drivers in Device Manager/Unknown Devices to your saved directory of drivers and all hardware will successfully reinstall except for the mouse buttons, which will need reprogramming through Autohotkey or some other key remapping application (for a Autohotkey script to address this, google reviews of “Topton L4” and one will provide a download).Secondly, while the machine mostly performs well with very current Linux distros, internal sound/headphone requires a custom kernel compilation. If you google yangxiaohua2009 and visit his github, you’ll find his work with the ESSX8336 audio chip and a couple of ready-made .deb kernels. His kernels do not include 32-bit capability in the .config, which I need, and only his latest kernel solves the issue of no sound after resuming from suspend.As another reviewer states, a usb headphone connection will produce sound in Linux and perhaps that’s enough for a user that doesn’t want the hassle of compiling. The hassle was worth it for me, and I run a 5.19 kernel on MX Linux 21 ahas (ahas has wifi working out of the box), and with his patches found on #9 in his github issues, I have internal sound and sound after resume. I imagine that ESSX8336 drivers will be available in mainstream kernels, maybe 6.2 or 6.3Also: a properly-working left mouse requires Linux terminal commands “xkbset exp "=mousekeys"” followed by “xkbset m”One thing I have not been able to solve is the always-on fan. It seems un-programmable in either Windows or Linux—on the other hand, this device can produce significant spikes in temperature, even during light browsing, so constant cooling may be necessary.Ultimately, these software workarounds prevent me from giving this computer 5 stars, but if you’re willing to tinker, both freshly-installed Windows 11 Pro and Linux can perform admirably, and I’m glad I bought it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s not the fastest little laptop but it works well enough. My son is autistic and he loves to code. We take this little laptop in the car and to appointments to allow him to keep working on his projects on the go. The small size means we can even take it to Disney and let him pull it out in lines so he has an easier time with the wait. It is sturdy enough to travel in a backpack onto rollercoasters. It has been a good purchase.

Excelente hasta el momento la calidad del producto y los materiales es justo lo que buscaba en cuanto a tamaño y especificaciones técnicas. Se agradecen también los detalles adicionales Windows y office instalado y el mouse de regalo. Sin duda una muy buena opción 👍
Lo misma potencia de una lap grande en una pocket, me gustó mucho.
Muy útil para realizar trabajos rápidos. Su tamaño y peso permite llevarla a todos lados.

reviews.reviewTitle: Es una muy buena compra, cumple con todo lo descrito y estoy muy satisfecho al haberlo elegido
reviews.reviewText: En general me agrado todo, velocidad, capacidad y sistema.
Para mis trabajos rápidos es genial
